name: Samurai of the Lanterns
description:
You are the Lantern Keeper, sworn to protect the lanterns in the dark forest. The forest guardians are determined to chase you out of the forest, one way or another. 

Guide the Lantern Keeper through the malignant forest in this action-packed rouge-lite with Samurai-style fighting!

This is my first game, and I would really appreciate any feedback on what I should add or fix first! Thank you (bow)! Features:

* Face enemies in old-school Samurai sword fights. Slash, throw your Katana, dodge, pray at shrines, or fly to take cover!

* Monsters with different attack patterns — you won't get bored by killing (or being killed by) the same enemy

* Unlocks and Upgrades for meta progression, and some fun dialogs hidden throughout levels

* There is a cat who follows you throughout the whole game (inspired by my cat Smokey)

Controls: WASDMoveLeft MouseAttackRight MouseDodge (Click) / Fly (Press)SpaceThrow/Retrieve SwordZBow
